name: Project Mario 2
description: My team and I built a game from scratch and with no experience in game development and we were able to win the game jam competition and we were able to finish this game in 2 & 1/4 days. We built our version of Mario Game using a game engine called "GDevelop" and basics JavaScript coding, our game will start like a Mario game with our character will lead you to 3 different many games, soccer game, a ping pong, and a Pac-Man, you as the player will be able to enter these many games by finding the black holes and enter them. the game is FREE to download and test.
